column4: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in Which (Col. 4) - Investigation Refused
column5: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in Which Investigation Was Completed (Col. 5) - Charge Found False / Mistake of Fact or Law Etc.
column6: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in Which Investigation Was Completed (Col. 6) - Final Report True Submitted
column7: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in Which Investigation Was Completed (Col. 7) - Charge Sheets Submitted
column8: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in Which Investigation Was Completed (Col. 8) - Total = Col. {(5) + (6) + (7)}
column9: Percentage of Cases Pending Investigation at the end of the year (Col. 9)
